home.title: Flashlearn
home.slogan: Discover new knowledge - Let your curiosity lead the way!

signInPage.thirdPartyLogin: Choose a third party authentication for quick and safe access

profileSetupPage.nicknameTaken: Nickname already taken. Please choose another
profileSetupPage.nicknameMinimum: Nickname must contain at least 2 letters
profileSetupPage.nicknameMaximum: Nickname can contain at most 50 letters

explore.tag: Select a keyword to find more specific decks

decks.createNewSet: Create a new deck of flashcards

noDecks.noRecentSetsEx: Your recently practiced decks will appear here
noDecks.noCreatedSetsEx: Create a deck to start learning!
noDecks.noBookmakedSetsEx: Your bookmarked decks will appear here

createDeck.name: Name
createDeck.privateDescription: Private decks are only visible to you.
createDeck.addFlashcardDescription: Every flashcard has a front and back. The front has a term or question, and the back side can contain an answer or explanation.

collections.noCollectionDescription: Create a collection to organize and practice multiple decks at once

toasts.saveFailed: The collection could not be stored
toasts.editFailed: Your changes could not be stored

legal.privacyPolicy2: This document contains Flashlearn's policy on how we store and use your personal information. It applies to all services provided through Flashlearn.no
legal.privacyPolicy3: When you sign in with a third party account (We currently support Github and Google) for the purposes of authentication we store your name, email and profile picture associated with your chosen account provider, along with a nickname of your choosing.
legal.privacyPolicy4: We use SupaBase as a database provider, this means that your information is stored in a postgres database.
legal.ToS2: This document contains Flashlearn's policy on how you can use the services provided on the site 'Flashlearn.no'
legal.ToS3: We reserve the right to remove any users that abuse our services, example given:
legal.ToS4: - Use of the card generation feature for purposes other than using the generated flashcards
legal.ToS5: - Explicit language on manually created cards

generateFromKeywords.dialogDescription: Enter a list of keywords to generate flashcards from

generationType.moreTheoreticalTooltip: Generates study cards with definitions and theoretical questions.
generationType.mixedTooltip: Contains both theoretical definitions and practical questions.
generationType.morePracticalTooltip: Focuses on practical tasks and direct application.

generateFromCourse.dialogDescription: Generate cards from a course at NTNU.

generateFromFile.dialogDescription: Upload a file (.txt or .pdf), and study cards will be generated from it.

generateFromText.dialogDescription: Enter your text, and study cards will be generated from it.

userSettings.academicLevelDescription: Academic level is used, among other things, to tailor exercises
userSettings.deleteUserDataInfo: Will delete all data associated with you from our database, i.e., personal data (name, email, picture), your progress, your study cards, collections, etc.
userSettings.andRelated: and all related data will be deleted
userSettings.errorDescription: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact us via email.
